alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:52PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pueblo County through 130 PM MDT... At 1252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Pueblo West, or 14 miles northwest of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo West and northern Pueblo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
